bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard Criteria for the Protection of Class 1E Power Systems and Equipment in Nuclear Power Generating Stations
IEEE Draft Standard Criteria for the Protection of Class 1E Power Systems and Equipment in Nuclear Power Generating Stations

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard provides the principal design criteria, design features, and testing requirements for the protection of Class 1E power systems and equipment supplied from those systems. It identifies special protection features that are needed where the requirements of nuclear power generating stations necessitate supplementing accepted industry practices.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
